about_the_game:
A set of 3 digital battle maps referring to relevant locations from the Tavern Talk storyline. These maps come as PNGs ready to print (for personal use only) AND ready to use for virtual tabletops (VTTs). We will deliver them grided and gridless so you can slide them into your own D&D5e campaigns or any other TTRPG campaign right away.

To access this content please do the following:
  • Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse...".
  • Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.
